Topic.Title: Trouble Getting Special Link To Work

Posts.EditableText:
Hi. So I'm working on a Steven Universe text adventure. I'm trying to get it to look like a gamebook. Do I need hyperlinks? I don't know what I'm doing.

So what I'm trying to do is move the player from one room to another. It's in the room description. This is what I have now:
```
You are at Ancient Ruins.
{exit:Aab}
```

This is my game. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/tu-ceu4k5eqd0m0ztu7zya/steven-universe-the-beginnings

Hey!  It's jmne!!!

Hello!  I hope you're doing well!

---
If you want it to look like a gamebook, you definitely need hyperlinks.

https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/samples/topic/4772/how-to-make-a-text-adventure-look-like-a-gamebook
